channel.title: CVE Feed for LG Electronics -- LG Signage

item.title: CVE-2024-1886|2024-03-05T01:27:48.594Z -- LG Electronics -- LG Signage
item.description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to traverse the directory on the affected webOS of LG Signage.

item.title: CVE-2024-1885|2024-03-05T01:28:08.674Z -- LG Electronics -- LG Signage
item.description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on the affected webOS of LG Signage.
